mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USED_PRODUCT(UPRODUCT_NO, SUBJECT, NICKNAME, PRICE, INFO, UPRODUCT_CD, AREA, MAINPHOTO, PHOTO) VALUES(#{UPRODUCT_NO}, #{SUBJECT}, #{NICKNAME}, #{PRICE}, #{INFO}, #{UPRODUCT_CD}, #{AREA}, #{MAINPHOTO}, #{PHOTO})
mapper.select: SELECT UPRODUCT_NO, SUBJECT, NICKNAME, UPRODUCT_CD, PRICE, INFO, AREA, LOCATION, MAINPHOTO, PHOTO FROM USED_PRODUCT ORDER BY SUBJECT
SELECT UPRODUCT_NO, SUBJECT, NICKNAME, UPRODUCT_CD, PRICE, INFO, AREA, LOCATION, MAINPHOTO, PHOTO FROM USED_PRODUCT WHERE SUBJECT LIKE #{keyword} ORDER BY SUBJECT
